brief: After 3 years at Mines St-Etienne engineering school rich of projects and experiences, I specialized in computer science, microelectronics and developed project management skills. Today I would like to answer to technical challenges by bringing creative and well thought out solutions.
description: Highly motivated student looking for an internship abroad from April to August 2020
